official_title: Assessing the Effectiveness of a Smoke-Free Home Program in Tribal Communities
inclusion_criteria:
* 18 years of age and older
* Self-report as being a smoker or living with a smoker
* Indicate that they do not reside in a smoke-free home
* Identify as living in an American Indian household
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Children under the age of 18 will not be included
